snippet: Prosecutors in St. Petersburg are investigating an exhibition at the State Hermitage Museum by the British artists Jake and Dinos Chapman for possible violations of a law on inciting religious hatred.
abstract: Prosecutors in St Petersburg, Russia, are investigating an exhibition at State Hermitage Museum by British artists Jake and Dinos Chapman for possible violations of law on inciting religious hatred.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in St. Petersburg are investigating an exhibition at the State Hermitage Museum by the British artists Jake and Dinos Chapman for possible violations of a law on inciting religious hatred.

headline.main: Russia: Prosecutors Investigate After Exhibition Draws Complaints
headline.print_headline: Russia: Prosecutors Investigate After Exhibition Draws Complaints
